data.message: I can't stop laughing at all the dumbasses who comment on this, when they say they hate him. Lmao literally take time out of your day to troll a person's photo or page. Man. All I can do is laugh, I agree with Eminem, fuck you guys for voting for trump. Can't wait for the album E.

replies.message: Obviously you do if you take time to troll.
Your just the point of my comment. Good day.

This is an album, not a political statement.these fucktards, whether anti or pro trump, are morons. Protect quietly ya softies. “He hurts my feelings.”... can you imagine,”hey I️ don’t like him” being announced. Lol media has mind fucked you all into thinking what you say matters. Clearly morons will continue to say dumb shit and my comment will fall on deaf...eyes? Picking presidents has nothing to do with musical taste. Listen to the music and get out of your feelings. Or don’t.

I’m shitting at work. I️ have about 34 more seconds to get my point across. No one cares who you do or don’t like. 

“Hey I️ don’t like that guy, so I️ don’t like you pal!!” Sounds like 5 year olds arguing on the playground
Mathias Sonny Shirley nooot you duuude shit comment on the douche that actually is trolling you lmao
And who believes that election can change anything, he is a sleeping sheep. Presidents of United States of America are selected by elite, not elected and you are living an illusion of free choice.
Yessssss

I didn't comment to start a political argument, I'm just say I agree with Eminem on saying fuck Donald Trump, I hate him as a person and being president is a plus factor. I mostly commented about the fucking trolls who are bringing politics in more and talking shit. If you don't like him why comment. I grown up listening to  Eminem and will always like him.
But you took the time out to troll the fans who were against his shitty rap against trump, if he runs out of breath that fast in a  rap on the spot he should probably stop.
I️ couldnt piece together what point this one was making but it sounded irrelevant . Most rappers can’t even spit live let alone a 5-10 minutes cypher hahaha
All I can do is laugh...and reply about how all I can do is laugh lol the facebook most ironic sht ever I swear
Chris Allen your f’d up IPhone texting is hilarious!While you’re trying to make a point, hard to take it seriously! 😂🤣
So did y'all not watch the CMA"S? surely they're next in your list to boycott.
Fuck you and your hatred
What can't  wait for the new pop star album from emienm?

If anybody actually expects an album that is good from Eminem, let me tell you now butter cup it's gonna be just as bad as campaign speech (which no one ever seems to remember because God was it bad) just as bad as MMLP2 and just as bad as that wack ass BET cpyher

Only they're not trolls... they're just giving their opinion on Eminem. You keep using that word like an autistic cuck. Are you sure you know what it means? Because calling someone a troll over their opinion makes you sound pretty fucking stupid. I don't like Trump either, but stupidity like yours is everyone's annoyance.
Eminem is a fake ass bitch just like the rest of them who use to rap about trump
As you make troll replies to troll comments?!?! Your are a contradiction, only less juicy solid, and more genius retard scenario
F U C K Y O U
